name: Glass Digital
tagline: Discover digital marketing with a difference
description:
Glass Digital is a digital marketing agency specializing in organic search (SEO), paid search (PPC), and affiliate marketing. 
They deliver return on investment and maintain full transparency throughout the course of client campaigns.
Glass Digital get to know their client's business from day one, and continue asking questions along the way. This combined with their monitoring of competitor activity and industry trends allows them to make contextual decisions every day.
